009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
016import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
017import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
018import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
019
020public class Map_Ripple implements PlugInFilter {
021        
022        static double aX = 10;
023        static double aY = 10;
024        static double tauX = 120 / (2 * Math.PI);
025        static double tauY = 250 / (2 * Math.PI);
026        
027        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
028                return DOES_ALL;
029        }
030
031        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
032
033                Mapping2D imap = new Mapping2D() {
034                        @Override
035                        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d uv) {
036                                final double u = uv.getX();
037                                final double v = uv.getY();
038                                double x = u + aX * Math.sin(v / tauX);
039                                double y = v + aY * Math.sin(u / tauY);
040                                return Pnt2d.from(x, y);
041                        }
042                };
043                
044                new ImageMapper(imap, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
045        }
046
047}
